definitions.definition: A rubber - soled lace-up canvas shoe for sports or onboard ships ; a precursor of trainers .
The plimsoll symbol ⦵ (or o ) that is used as a superscript in the notation of thermodynamics to indicate an arbitrarily chosen non-zero reference point.

main_definition: ( UK , Ireland ) A rubber - soled lace-up canvas shoe for sports or onboard ships ; a precursor of trainers .
secondary_definitions: The plimsoll symbol ⦵ (or o ) that is used as a superscript in the notation of thermodynamics to indicate an arbitrarily chosen non-zero reference point.
